title: Island link
brief_description: In March of 1957, the cable linking Tasmania with the mainland was broken. This film shows the operations necessary to locate the break and raise, repair and re-lay the submarine cable in Bass Strait.
description: In March of 1957, the cable linking Tasmania with the mainland was broken. This film shows the operations necessary to locate the break and raise, repair and re-lay the submarine cable in Bass Strait.
